actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to provide that the chairman and vice chairman of the Board shall continue to serve until their successors are designated and have qualified.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to provide that the chairman and the vice chairman of the Federal Reserve Board shall continue to serve after the expiration of their terms until their successors are designated and have qualified.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to provide that the chairman and vice chairman of the Board shall continue to serve until their successors are designated and have qualified.
